tips.tip: Try using the web app on your laptop from your phone's WiFi hotspot.
It is OK to bookmark the web app in your browser, however the IP address can change when your WiFi router is reset or power cycled.
The IP address is used to access the web app from any browser on your WiFi LAN.
Use the double-arrow recycle icon to update the IP address when network parameters have been changed.
When the dashboard shows "Unsecured, no password", anyone on your network can use the web app to access your phone. Select Settings-Web app user credentials to assign a username and password.
Optimize DEX gives you the ability to remove classes from the DEX, to make computation faster and bypass downstream decompile issues.
The Jadx compile operates directly on the DEX. CFR and Fernflower operate on JAR files, requiring DEX to JAR conversion.
Lucene search can be performed on the entire private storage drive, on a specific application or on a compiler specific source folder.
Settings Stack size allows you to change the memory allocation used by decompile utilities.
A decompiler is having a beer at the bar when he is heldup by a gunman. He says "Don't do it, I can see right through you and know what you plan to do!"
If the decompile process stalls, look at the log carefully and add any offending classes to the dex_class_exclusion.txt file, then re-optimize the DEX.
Add your own Search Sets with the Search Manager. You can search dozens of keywords and phrases at one time.
Internet search "Lucene cheat sheet" to find tips and tricks for effective use of this powerful search engine.
Manage Show Tips from the Settings menu. If you disable the Show Tips checkbox, tips will not be shown again. Selecting Close tips is temporary.
